The app collects data from the cricket bat sensor, BatSense and works in tandem with it. After collecting the data from the performance tracker device, BatSense, the app is equipped with data processing to help you in training, analysis and evaluation of batting in cricket.

This is the smart cricketing solution that is changing the game of cricket as we know it.

The SmartCricket App can be used by players as well as coaches, enabling the players to analyze their game and even connect with a coach and get advice from the coach in real time. The coaches can, on the other hand, connect with their player or players and guide the players in real time from wherever they are.

Train like the pros with BatSense and the SmartCricket app.

The Smart Cricket app displays a range of parameters on batting performance and has several features that enable players and coaches to analyse and improve batting performance.

Batting Parameters:
 Data captured by our smart cricket batting sensor, BatSense and collected by the SmartCricket app is presented in 11 comprehensive parameters which can assist you in altering, modifying, changing or correcting your game. Parameters like Bat Speed, Bat Angles, Back Lift, Follow-through and Impact Angles etc. will bring a whole new perspective to the game.

3D Shot Analysis: 
A 3D simulation of your Smart Bat swing, from the back lift to the follow through, tracks the path of your bat enabling a 360 degree view for each shot played. You can thus review your shots from any angle, online and offline.

Smart Video: 
The SmartCricket App can be allowed to use the mobile camera to record videos of your game from any angle and playback even in slow motion. It also facilitates easy viewing through an auto-cut feature which trims the footage to show just the shots played.

Compare Videos:
 In order to perfect your technique and even correct or alter your shot playing, this feature allows you to compare videos of different shots and study the variations and divergence of different shots played. This way practicing in a targeted and focused manner is assisted even through videos.

Coach Mode:

The Coach can also view reports on analytics to track progress against the set goals and against the individual parameters. A progress analysis week-wise or month-wise can also be generated by the Coach to help him better assess the situation.

CricScore is a free, simple cricket scoring app without any ads or subscription fees required. CricScore’s unique features provide a smooth and pleasant user experience.  

Key Features:
-	Free app, no ads present, no subscription required
-	The opponent team does not need to use this app for you to score your batting innings
-	Create teams without requiring an email address/phone number of each team member
-	Add all the team members in a single click
-	Private PIN for each team to avoid random teams playing against your team
-	Showing the next spell bowler at the top at the end of the over
-	Temporarily skip sign-in and connect your email address later.

CricScore app allows you to create a team efficiently add all team members in one attempt, which saves time by avoiding adding each team member individually.

Your opponent team does not need to use this app for you to score your batting innings as there is an option to play against a sample team (created by CricScore). You can play against any opponent in the world as long as you have their team name and their team’s private PIN. Each team's private PIN prevents other teams from scoring against your team without your knowledge. Each team can update scoring from their mobiles without sharing the same account – changes will be live and available on each individual’s respective mobiles.

While choosing the next bowler to bowl, CricScore shows the next spell bowler who can potentially continue at the top. CricScore also shows every other bowlers’ stats while choosing the next bowler to bowl. 

CricScore needs only the email address of the team’s administrator to create an account to sign in to the app. CricScore does not require other team members' phone numbers/email addresses to create a team.

There is an option for users to sign in anonymously without an email. Later, an email can be linked to the anonymous account. The anonymous user can still use all the signed-in user's features. However, CricScore does not recommend this option as the user will lose all their team's information, scores, and other data when they delete the app from their phone.

Cricscore’s founder created this app single-handedly in his free time to help cricket lovers everywhere enjoy the game more. Please let us know your feedback and suggestions by emailing support@cricscore.net.
